I just know it's a has an unbreakable

it's just life's empty without
it I have to say the people who really
impress me when I have a chance to meet
them are people whose names nobody will
ever hear
uh so for example you know in southern
let me give you a personal very personal
example a couple of uh months ago I
learned that uh extremely poor peasants
in southern Colombia whose lives are
being
destroyed in part by us-run chemical
warfare called fumigation which just
destroys their agricultural lands and

things I've ever experienced I've
actually met some of them I did go down
and couldn't do much I couldn't do
anything for them I just listened to
horrible testimonies but these are

feelings commitment concern a suffering
beyond what we can imagine but willing
to do something for someone else they've
never met and I you find things like
that all over the place here
too
uh some of the most moving experiences
I've had are just uh in black churches
in the South during the Civil Rights
Movement where you know people are
getting beaten killed
really struggling for the most
Elementary rights just asking for the
